page.title: 18SS PETER AND PAUL SCHOOL
page.content: Our school is a Roman Catholic school attached to Clifton Cathedral .At our school there are 8 classrooms and 4 classes.It was opened in December 1975 and now there are about 120 children.There are 3 playgrounds;1 infant playground and 1 large junior playground and 1 small playground there is a Headmaster four fulltime teachers and 2 part time teachers .After school we have Gym club (twice a week Thursdays and Fridays) some times we have pottery and football practice. School start at 9.00 _ 3.30
